body:
Im a 17 year old girl  ( im not that good at pvp but i would said im average ) i used to play on this server years ago before they changed the name to avicus. If you want to play with me you can i dont have skype =( i use steam instead you can add me there and we can chat or you can follow me on tentacl =) i also play on other servers if you u ever see me you can always say hi if you want to!

When i used to play on MCzone which is now Avicus i took a long break from MCzone then when i logged back on it was in public beta so started to play Nebula a few weeks later then i realized its the same server (Im so dumb)

-ItsHurshyMC o3o

title: Hello Avicus Players <HEY!>

replies.body: Hello! Welcome back to Avicus / MCZone. If you have any questions regarding the server, by all means you may contact any Moderator, some regulars may also be willing to lend a hand.
replies.body_tagged: Hello! Welcome back to Avicus / MCZone. If you have any questions regarding the server, by all means you may contact any Moderator, some regulars may also be willing to lend a hand.

replies.body: Welcome to avicus! Be sure to stay as long as you want! Check out all the gamemodes! Bring friends! Follow rules! Most important HAVE FUN :D
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to avicus! Be sure to stay as long as you want! Check out all the gamemodes! Bring friends! Follow rules! Most important HAVE FUN :D

replies.body: Welcome to Avicus, I'm sure you'll have a ton of fun ^_^
replies.body_tagged: Welcome to Avicus, I'm sure you'll have a ton of fun ^_^

replies.body:
Welcome back to Avicus bud!
If you have any questions, feel free to ask.
We'll be more than happy to help!!

replies.body: Welcome back! I'm relatively new (5 months registered but I only really played on the server for 4 of those) so I wouldn't remember you. FaZe is a CoD (Call of Duty) thing, I used to play but it's not worth the rage tbh. I'm a pretty calm person but damn CoD is frustrating.

replies.body: I just can say: "Heey". Everybody already told you the important things, but if you need someone to talk or just some map help, you can add me on skype: Flo.schmenni. Well just add me ;)
